mapper.insert: insert into products(num, name, company, image, stock, price, contents, point, inputdate) values(seqprod.nextval, #{name}, #{company}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock}, #{price}, #{contents}, #{point}, #{inputdate})
mapper.select: select * from products where num = #{ num }
mapper.delete: delete from products where num = #{ num }
mapper.update: update products set name = #{ name }, company = #{ company }, price = #{ price }, stock = #{ stock }, point = #{ point }, contents = #{ contents }, image = #{ image } where num = #{ num }
update products set stock = stock - #{ stock } where num = #{ num }
